snippet: Mesut Özil scored on an 89th-minute free kick Tuesday as host Real Madrid salvaged a tie against attack-minded Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League’s toughest group.
abstract: Real Madrid ties Borussia Dortmund, 2-2; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mesut Özil scored on an 89th-minute free kick Tuesday as host Real Madrid salvaged a tie against attack-minded Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League’s toughest group.

headline.seo: Real Madrid Rallies for Tie Against Dortmund
headline.main: Real Madrid Rallies Late for a Tie
